backend/main.mo: Defines core data types, OAuth config, and in-memory maps for rooms, games, players, users, stats, and events in the backend actor.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files and assets.
frontend/deploy/Caddyfile: Caddy reverse‑proxy config for serving the frontend canister with HTTPS, SPA routing, caching, and security headers.
frontend/deploy/nginx.conf: Nginx reverse‑proxy config for serving the frontend canister with SSL, caching rules, SPA routing, and security headers.
frontend/docs/configuration.md: Explains all frontend and backend configuration values, including canister IDs, IC host resolution, and Google OAuth settings.
frontend/docs/deployment.md: Deployment guide covering local development, production setup, health checks, configuration, and optional reverse proxies.
frontend/docs/game-snapshot-contract.md: Documentation defining the structure and usage of the canonical Game Snapshot for realtime sync and rendering.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and shared UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and generated icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline support, SPA routing fallback, and cache management.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all application routes and wraps the app in the router provider.
frontend/src/components/game/DoubleFinis: Empty component file placeholder for a double-finish confirmation modal.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverScr: UI component showing game results with winner info and actions for stats, rematch, or new game.
frontend/src/components/game/Keypad.tsx: Numeric keypad component with quick score chips, voice input option, and submit/clear actions.
Displays a player's name, remaining score, and active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/game/ResumeSaved: Modal prompting the user to resume or discard an in-progress saved game.
frontend/src/components/game/ThreeDartsE: Component for entering up to three darts with multipliers, number grid, bull options, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/game/TurnHistory: Renders the last five turns with player, score, remaining points, and status icons, including bust and win indicators.
frontend/src/components/game/VoiceScoreC: Displays a dialog to confirm or edit voice-recognized score input, showing transcript, parsed score, and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/rooms/ClaimSeatP: Allows authenticated users to claim unclaimed player seats, handling API calls, success/error states, and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/rooms/DisplaySco: Shows player scores and highlights the active player or displays a winner summary when the game is completed.
frontend/src/components/rooms/GameSettin: Provides UI to configure game mode, double-out option, and player assignments before creating a new game.
frontend/src/components/rooms/HostLiveSc: Enables hosts to enter scores, undo turns, and view player states while updating the game snapshot via API.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RecentTurn: Displays a read-only table of the most recent turns with player names, scores, remaining points, and win/bust status.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomCodeDi: UI component showing a room code with a copy-to-clipboard button and temporary success alert.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameDetails.ts: Fetches game metadata for a given game ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameHistory.ts: Provides hooks to fetch a user's game history and paginated turns for a game via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameRealtime.ts: Manages a realtime WebSocket connection for game events and delivers snapshot updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity auth, identity loading, login, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyProfile.ts: Fetches the current user's profile and exposes loading state tied to actor readiness.
In‑memory provider for storing and clearing a Google OAuth access token.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerGameStats.ts: Fetches player game statistics either by game ID or by user ID using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: High-level session abstraction combining Internet Identity auth and OAuth token management with sign-in/out helpers.
Implements browser speech recognition with start/stop control and transcript/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserStats.ts: Fetches statistics for the current user or a specified user via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and base element styling.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with header, footer, auth-aware buttons, and registers a service worker.
frontend/src/lib/adminTokenStorage.ts: Manages admin tokens per room code using localStorage with get, set, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/lib/checkoutSuggestions.ts: Generates up to three dart checkout suggestions for a given score when Double Out is enabled.
frontend/src/lib/gameCore.ts: Implements core game state, dart scoring, turn application with double-out logic, and win/bust detection.
frontend/src/lib/gamePersistence.ts: Handles saving, loading, migrating, and clearing game state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/gameSettings.ts: Defines game settings, provides localStorage persistence, validation, and player name sanitization.
frontend/src/lib/gameStats.ts: Computes player statistics such as averages, 180s, busts, and checkout percentages from game history.
frontend/src/lib/playerDisplayName.ts: Provides helpers for selecting player display names and detecting unclaimed player seats.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeEventEnvelope.t: Defines realtime event envelope types, game snapshot schema, and helpers for parsing and identifying events.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeTransport.ts: Implements a WebSocket-based realtime transport with fallback, reconnection, and event parsing.
frontend/src/lib/roomGameApi.ts: Provides functions to create games, add players, and submit scores in rooms, handling backend errors and returning snapshots.
frontend/src/lib/roomsApi.ts: Handles room creation and lookup via backend calls, generating room codes and returning admin tokens.
frontend/src/lib/voiceScoreParser.ts: Parses spoken English phrases into numeric dart scores using word-to-number rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailsPage.tsx: Displays game details and paginated turns, handling loading, errors, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/GameHistoryPage.tsx: Displays a user’s game history with filters for mode and date, handling authentication and pagination. Fetches history data and navigates to individual game pages.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Runs the main game UI including scoring, voice input, turn history, and realtime updates. Manages game state, persistence, and navigation from URL parameters.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleOAuthRedirectPa: Handles Google OAuth callback, processes token or errors, updates session state, and redirects users. Cleans sensitive data from the URL after processing.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides login options via Internet Identity or Google OAuth, showing loading and error states. Redirects authenticated users to their profile.
frontend/src/pages/MyAccountPage.tsx: Legacy account page that automatically redirects users to the new profile page after initialization. Shows transitional UI with manual redirect option.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile and stats when authenticated, or prompts users to sign in or complete registration. Includes sign‑out support and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Page that handles user profile creation, performing validation, registration mutation, and conditional UI for auth, loading, and existing profiles.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDisplayTvPage.tsx: Read‑only TV display for a room that connects to realtime updates and shows scoreboard and recent turns with connection status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/RoomHostScorerPage.ts: Host/scorer control page for creating and managing a room’s game, handling admin tokens, authorization, game creation, and live scoring updates.
frontend/src/pages/StartGamePage.tsx: Starting page to configure game settings or manage multi‑device room creation/joining, including admin token storage and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Displays computed statistics for a saved game or shows a message if no game data exists, with navigation back to game or home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state and architecture, focusing on user authentication additions and planned frontend/game features.
